name: Kepler-452b
description: A super-Earth exoplanet orbiting within the habitable zone of a sun-like star.

name: Proxima Centauri b
description: Closest known exoplanet to the Solar System, orbiting the red dwarf Proxima Centauri.

name: TRAPPIST-1e
description: One of seven Earth-sized planets orbiting the ultra-cool dwarf star TRAPPIST-1.

name: LHS 1140 b
description: A rocky super-Earth orbiting within the habitable zone of a red dwarf star.

name: Gliese 667 Cc
description: A super-Earth exoplanet orbiting in the habitable zone of the Gliese 667 C star.

name: Wolf 1061c
description: A potentially habitable exoplanet orbiting the red dwarf Wolf 1061.

name: Ross 128 b
description: A temperate exoplanet orbiting the red dwarf Ross 128.

name: Kepler-22b
description: The first confirmed planet found in the habitable zone of a sun-like star.

name: Kepler-62f
description: A super-Earth exoplanet in the habitable zone of the star Kepler-62.

name: Kepler-186f
description: The first Earth-size planet discovered in the habitable zone of another star.

name: Tau Ceti e
description: A super-Earth orbiting the star Tau Ceti, relatively close to Earth.

name: Kapteyn b
description: An old super-Earth orbiting the star Kapteyn's Star.

name: Gliese 581g
description: A controversial potentially habitable exoplanet orbiting Gliese 581.

name: HD 40307 g
description: A super-Earth orbiting within the habitable zone of HD 40307.

name: Kepler-440b
description: A super-Earth exoplanet in the habitable zone of its star.
